response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $15,000 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. Given your keen interest and appreciation for this product, which I estimate to be worth $8,000 to you, I am extending a special offer. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure this product at a special price of $12,000. I believe this offers a fair compromise that reflects both the value I place on the product and the value it holds for you. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
